alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 10:43PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...AREAS OF DENSE FOG DEVELOPING IN CAMERON COUNTY... At 10:30 PM, Surface observations from both the Brownsville and Harlingen Airports indicate that areas of dense fog have formed reducing the visibilities down to one quarter to one half of a mile across the central and western portions of Cameron County. These areas of dense fog will likely persist through the overnight hours across Cameron County and may spread across the rest of the Rio Grande Valley. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed overnight into Thurday morning if the visibilities continue to worsen over the Rio Grande Valley. Motorists should be aware of locally dense fog with visibility changing rapidly over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road.
